00014 HierarchyGroup::HierarchyGroup(QWidget *parent):
00015 QGroupBox(tr("Product Hierarchy"), parent),
00016 globalBox_(tr("Global"), this),
00017 productBox_(tr("Product"), this),
00018 boardBox_(tr("Board"), this),
00019 chipBox_(tr("Chip"), this),
00020 socBox_(tr("SoC"), this),
00021 ipBox_(tr("IP"), this),
00022 options_() {
00023 
00024         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00025         layout->addWidget(&globalBox_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00026         layout->addWidget(&productBox_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00027         layout->addWidget(&boardBox_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00028         layout->addWidget(&chipBox_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00029         layout->addWidget(&socBox_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00030         layout->addWidget(&ipBox_, 1, 2, 1, 1);
00031         layout->setSpacing(0);
00032 
00033         globalBox_.setChecked(true);
00034         productBox_.setChecked(true);
00035         boardBox_.setChecked(true);
00036         chipBox_.setChecked(true);
00037         socBox_.setChecked(true);
00038         ipBox_.setChecked(true);
00039 
00040         connect(&globalBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00041                 this, SLOT(onGlobalChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(&productBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00043                 this, SLOT(onProductChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044         connect(&boardBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00045                 this, SLOT(onBoardChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046         connect(&chipBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00047                 this, SLOT(onChipChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048         connect(&socBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00049                 this, SLOT(onSocChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00050         connect(&ipBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00051                 this, SLOT(onIpChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00052 }

00054 HierarchyGroup::~HierarchyGroup() {
00055 }

00057 void HierarchyGroup::onGlobalChange( int state ) {
00058         options_.global_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00059         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void HierarchyGroup::onProductChange( int state ) {
00063         options_.product_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00064         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00065 }
